definition: to pull strings/to manipulate (a puppet)/to control from behind the scene/to mediate
to lead along/to pull (an animal on a tether)/(bound form) to involve/to draw in
thread/string/wire/line/CL:條|条[tiao2],股[gu3],根[gen1]/(after a number) tier (unofficial ranking of a Chinese city)
variant of 線|线[xian4]
a controller

sentences.english: Tag ! ine restrict swinging of ! oad.
sentences.chinese: 可限制负荷摆动弧度的牵线。

sentences.english: Think of yourself as a puppet with a string coming out of the top of your head.
sentences.chinese: 把自己想象成是一个牵线木偶，头上有一根线牵着。

sentences.english: Until this spring, a handful of people knew of his matchmaking project.
sentences.chinese: 直到今年春天，极少数人知道他的牵线搭桥项目。

sentences.english: Obviously, it organizes leasing packages for lessors and lessees.
sentences.chinese: 顾名思义，它的工作就是为出租人和承租人牵线搭桥。

sentences.english: EASTPO is the bridge connecting machine tool makers and shipbuilding makers.
sentences.chinese: 东博国际机床展为此牵线搭桥，推波助澜。

sentences.english: Trip of the Liu Xiang entire US is Yao Ming brings both sides together facilitates.
sentences.chinese: 刘翔整个美国之行是姚明在其中牵线搭桥所促成的。

sentences.english: A warmhearted man acted as a go-between for him and introduced him to a girl.
sentences.chinese: 一个热心人牵线搭桥给他介绍了一位姑娘。

sentences.english: And I am doing just fine without your Romantic help.
sentences.chinese: 没有你帮我牵线搭桥我也挺好。

definition: a controller
to act as go-between (between prospective marriage partners etc)
to recommend sb/to give a referral
intermediary/mediator
to act as go-between (between prospective marriage partners etc)
go-between/matchmaker
to play matchmaker/to act as a middleman
matchmaker/go-between/same as 月下老人[yue4 xia4 lao3 ren2]
matchmaker
to act as a matchmaker
to bring together/to mediate/to arrange a deal
lit. to thread a needle (idiom); fig. to act as a go-between
to tie the knot (idiom)/to get married
a marriage predestined by fate
to discuss a matter with sb/to get in touch with/to arrange
minor divinity concerned with marriage/matchmaker/go-between
